name: Possessed (itch) (emmasgames)
description:
Possessed is an interactive fiction piece created using Twine. I created this piece as a submission for an interactive fiction and computer games course after originally wanting to write something more dark and emotionally stirring, possibly even triggering for some people.

I decided against it in the end because I realized, while I knew the other subject matter very well on a personal level, I couldn't make balance the emotionally stirring aspects with aspects of fun. Possessed is the product of that decision.

So I hope you enjoy!
